attributes.action: Award Knighthoods to John Volanthen and Rick Stanton
attributes.background: The Thai children trapped in the caves has captured the world's attention. Two British people, John Volanthen and Rick Stanton, found the boys alive and then formed part of the team that rescued the boys. Their extraordinary courage and expertise should receive the highest honour

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
